channel.title: Run Server.bat and Run Client.bat 508+ Help Please?
channel.description:
Okay Im having me a runserver.bat error and its aggrivating the piss out of me... im working on a 517 turmoil soulsplit source, but when i go to run it to test my updates I cant run it the cmd says ive editted my run, changed to my edition, wont work still heres my run ----> @echo off Echo 517 color 9 cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
On my cmd when i run it, u get tons of errors like, main error class or some shit like that. im running windows 7, which is a real pain in the ass.
client probs.. the same thing when i try to run the client. heres my run client.bat ----> @echo off cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 pause its pissing me the fuck off please help me?!?!??!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!?

item.title: Run Server.bat and Run Client.bat 508+ Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @PureQuintin PureQuintin
item.description:
@PureQuintin wrote:

Hello, I am also using Windows 7 and I have similar problems. I’m not sure if this will correct your problem but I did notice one error, Java is found under “Program Files (x86)” on Windows 7, so in the “run” code change “C:\Program Files” to “C:\Program Files (x86)” I currently have a working “runserver” command, I will post it incase what I just stated does not work:
@echo off
Title NineScape
cd …/bin
color 40
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594
PAUSE

I hope that works for you, if you need a compiler mine works also. I just have problem with my client, not my server. So here is the Compiler:

@echo off
Title NineScape Compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

Hope that helps, and if anyone reading this knows how to correct a 508 Compiler on Windows 7, please let me know.

Add me at PureQuintin@hotmail.com

Have a good one :]

Read full topic
item.source: Run Server.bat and Run Client.bat 508+ Help Please?
